text: (Moses fomɨra Basanɨn Distrighɨn aven itir nguazim isa Manasen anabamɨn akuar mamɨn adarazigh anɨngi, a Jordanɨn Fanemɨn aruem anadi naghɨn iti. Ezɨ Josua aruem uaghiri naghɨn Jordanɨn Fanemɨn nguazir maba isa Manasen anabamɨn akuar igharazim ganɨngi.) Egha Josua me mɨgeima, Jordanɨn Fanemɨn vongɨn mangamin gumazamiziba uamategh uan nguibabar mangasava amima, Josua, God deragh me damuasa Godɨn azaragha,
